name: Dagger Dungeon
description:
Dagger Dungeon is a Game jam Entry Made in 48+ hours.

Instructions: WASD to move player. Click anywhere to throw one dagger You can carry many daggers but each one will weight you down.

Each enemy kill gives you 9 points.

Each dagger thrown makes you lose 1 point.

This game was made by:

- Casual Raffu: Programming

- TraceRewind: Art

- Froschy: Music
